original_text: For as surely as the Lord, the God of Israel, lives, who has restrained me from hurting you, unless you had hurried and come to meet me, truly by morning there had not been left to Nabal so much as one male.”
korean_text: 나를 막아 너를 해하지 않게 하신 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와의 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노니 네가 급히 와서 나를 영접하지 아니하였더면 밝는 아침에는 과연 나발에게 한 남자도 남겨 두지 아니하였으리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: For as surely as the Lord, the God of Israel, lives,
who has restrained me from hurting you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 막아 당신을 해치지 못하게 하셨으니,

sentences.original_text: unless you had hurried and come to meet me,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 속히 와서 나를 만나지 아니하였더라면,

sentences.original_text: there had not been left to Nabal so much as one male.”
sentences.korean_translation: 나발에게 남은 것이 사내 하나도 없었으리라.”
